title: [LF SCRIM] [Diamond2+] Monday/Tuesday, 16:00 or later CEST - IG: Humorlos
body:
Hello,

the **Main-Team** of **ENJOY Gaming e.V.** is looking for a team to scrim against.

**When?** -- Monday and/or Tuesday, 3rd/4th July -- 16:00 or later.
**Who?** -- Diamond2+.
**How long?** -- Bo3 at least.

If you're interested, please send me a friend request on league.
My IG: Humorlos

Greetings,
Humorlos
Team Manager of ENJOY Gaming e.V.
